Reference

All functions

cbg_pop

Unweighted Population by Census Block Group

county_pop

Unweighted Population by County

distancing

Example Stay-at-Home Data

expand_cat_json()

Expand and collapse a categorical JSON column

expand_integer_json()

Expand and collapse an integer JSON column

fips_from_cbg()

Pull state and county FIPS from CBG code

fips_to_names

State and county names by FIPS codes

hb_shrink()

Hierarchical Bayes Shrinkage

link_poi_naics()

Use a Core Places file to Create a POI-NAICS crosswalk

ma()

Seven-Day Moving Average

naics_2

NAICS 4-Digit Code Titles

naics_4

NAICS 4-Digit Code Titles

naics_codes

NAICS Code Titles

norm

Example Normalization Data

panel

Example Panel Information Data

pat_naics pat_naics

Example Patterns Data Aggregated by NAICS Code

rbind_by_list_pos()

Row-binds data.tables in a list of lists

read_core()

Read SafeGraph Core

read_distancing()

Read in Stay-at-Home Data

read_many_csvs()

Read and row-bind many CSVs

read_many_patterns()

Read and row-bind many patterns files

read_many_shop()

Read and row-bind many files from the SafeGraph Shop

read_patterns()

Read SafeGraph Patterns

read_shop()

Read a ZIP file with patterns and other data as it comes from the SafeGraph Shop

safegraph_aws()

Download SafeGraph data from AWS COVID Response

sample_size_adjust()

Adjust SafeGraph Data for Sampling Size Differences

scale_to_date()

Scale data relative to its value on a date

scale_yoy()

Calculate year-on-year change
